title: Caprese Farfalle
ingredients: 1/2 cup loosely packed thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
instructions: Microwave 1/4 cup vinegar in small microwaveable ramekin on HIGH 1-2 min or until thickened and reduced by half; cool completely.
Heat sauce and remaining vinegar in saucepan on medium heat.
Remove from heat; toss with hot pasta and half the cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze; serve topped with remaining cheese, tomatoes, and basil.
